00034 include_once("../../include.inc.php");
00035 
00036 $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'comment') {
00040     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00041     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'comment';
00042 }
00043 
00044 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00045     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00046     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'];
00047 }
00048 
00049 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save'])) {
00050     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber];
00051 }
00052 
00053 if (count($_POST)) {
00054     $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber]['type'] = "comment";
00055     $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] = $_POST['comment'];
00056     $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber];
00057 }
00058 
00059 /*
00060 * go back
00061 */
00062 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00063     
00064     $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00065     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00066     if (!isset($_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->rules[$rulenumber]['identifier'])) {
00067         $_SESSION['pfw']->$_GET['action']->del ($rulenumber);
00068     }
00069     header ("Location: ". $_GET['action']. ".php");
00070 }
00071 
00072 if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00073     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00074     header ("Location: ". $_GET['action']. ".php");
00075 }
00076 
00077 $active = $_GET['action'];
00078 page_header("Edit Comment");
00079 ?>
